body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Picnicking and Grilling              Picnicking and Grilling         NPS  Whether you spread out a blanket in the grass or use the park's picnic tables and grills, cooking out or picnicking in the park is a fun way to spend some time with friends and family. You're welcome to use your own charcoal grill, or use one of the park's grills. For your safety, and to protect the park, there are a few things you should know about. Prohibited:  Alcoholic beverages Propane and tabletop grills Open fires Balloons Driving or parking off-road  If you are planning a large gathering, please see Permits & Reservations for details, and see a full list of Rules & Regulations.
title: Anacostia Park: Picnicking and Grilling
